text: aur yadi ham ise banaate arabee (ke atirikt kisee) any bhaasha mein, to ve avashy kahate ki kyon nahin khol dee gayeen usakee aayaten? ye kya ki (pustak) gair arabee aur (nabee) arabee? aap kah den ki vah unake lie, jo eemaan laaye, maargadarshan tatha aarogyakar hai aur jo eemaan na laayen, unake kaanon mein bojh hai aur vah unapar andhaapan hai aur vahee pukaare ja rahe hain door sthaanon se
